profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Our company is committed in providing quality service with efficiency and cost effectiveness. Upon initial request, our staff will contact you to schedule an appointment to discuss your needs. Meeting you and viewing the job is important to us as it allows us to ensure that we give an accurate assessment and reduces the risk of unforeseen problems or misunderstanding which can affect budget. Once an assessment is performed and all your options are discussed, a quote will be provided within 2 to 5 business days (depending on size of a project).

When you choose Sonama Contracing, we work with you to determine timelines. We understand that you're excited about your project’s completion and that any renovation can disrupt your home or work. For this reason, projects are scheduled and completed as efficiently as possible without compromising quality.

We know that you will be satisfied with our work because we understand that without you and word of mouth…we don’t have a business.

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team
 
 
Showroom hours:
 
Monday –Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm
Sunday closed

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
GTA Countertops has more than 10 years of combined experience in the fabrication and installation of stone products. We purchase a carefully selected variety of granite, marble and quartz in large quantities and stock it locally. This system allows us to offer the luxury of real, natural granite or quartz counter tops at very affordable prices.
 
We pride ourselves in helping you achieve a more beautiful, money saving and practical approach to improving your dream home, we do not outsource any part of your project to another company, from start to finish, it is completed by our company!

profile:
Latitude Countertops is known for producing excellent quality Natural and Engineered Stone Countertops. Our commitment to provide top notch service has made us the largest fabricator of granite & quartz counter tops in the Toronto area.  Latitude fabricates  natural stone such as Granite and Marble from reputable suppliers. You don't need to worry about the quality of your stone, we only deal with the best. 
We work with all the leading Quartz companies such as  Caesarstone, Silestone, LG Viatera, Hanstone, Compac, and Diamastone. We will also fabricate acrylics such as Corian, Hi Macs and Staron.  
Customers can purchase their Kitchen countertops & Bathroom vanities directly or through our vast dealer network. We work with dealers all over Southern and Northeastern Ontario. To find a dealer near you check our website, as well for remnants and special offers visit our website www.latitudecountertops.com and view our blog at blog.latitudeonline.ca 
We meet the needs of our Builders, renovators and Home owners throughout Ontario.

To find a dealer close to you please visit our website.
service_area: Ontario;  G.T.A., Northern Ontario, Eastern Ontario, Southern Ontario, Western Ontario, Ajax, Whitby, Peterborough, Kawarthas, Peel, York, Courtice, Durham, Peterborough, Cobourg, Port Hope, Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Kingston, Trenton, Belleville, Napanee, Midland, Owen Sound, Wiarton, Orillia, Barrie, Innisfill, Alliston, Milton, Georgetown, Orangeville, Shellburne,
products:
Kitchen countertops and bathroom vanity countertops and shower and tub surrounds in Natural Stone such as Granite, Marble, Quartz such as Caesarstone Quartz, LG Vitera Quartz, Silestone Quartz, Hanstone Quartz, Compac Quartz, DuPont Zodiaq, DuPont Corian, Samsung Staron, Blanco Premium Sinks and Faucets.
We also do Laundry Room countertops, Entertainment Center countertops and bars, tub surrounds, fireplace walls and Hearths.
Tables and many other Natural and Engineered stone applications.
services: Latitude works on a Guaranteed 8 -10business day turnaround from countertop template to installation.  We digitally template all Kitchen and Bathroom countertops and can do so without removing your exiting countertop.  We also provide a countertop removal and or disposal service if you need to have your existing countertop removed before the new one is installed.  Our template process will take from 30min to 1.5hours.  Following the template, we will fabricate your custom countertop and return to install it within 10 business days, guaranteed.  Installations can take from 1 to 4 hours depending on the size of the project.   We also alter existing natural stone and acrylic countertops to fit new appliances.
brands: Caesarstone Quartz, Hanstone Quartz, Compac Quartz, LG Viatera Quartz, Silestone Quartz, DuPont Zodiaq, DuPont Corian, Samsung Staron, Blanco Premium Sinks and Faucets and Elegant Stainless Steel Sinks.
specialities:
!!!!  NEW IN JUNE 2014, Latitude now offers Granite and Quarzite Countertops with a 25 Year Stain Proof Warranty !!!!
We also have 5 colours of granite on promotion, available at $38.00 per square foot. Please contact us for more information.
Check out our remnants in our showroom, a vast selection of quartz, granite and marble.

profile: SkyLane Construction Services Inc. is a full service company that offer a broad range of services for your home, investment properties, commercial and cottage. Our experience and skills backs our ability to successfully complete projects of all sizes, ranging from property maintenance, handyman services, residential & commercial renovation, home addition, basement finishing, home & office detailing. Whether your goal are to improve upon, remodel or to maintain your property, our commitment to you is to make certain that your home, investment properties or cottage needs are successfully met through expertise, craftsmanship and meticulous attention to details. SkyLane provides warranty on all workmanship for a period of 1 year.

profile:
Our company “JJ home inspections and improvements” is based in Toronto and serving all the GTA. We are dedicated to serving our clients with quality and integrity. The team manager Jay Jahangiri is a civil engineering technologist and certified home inspector. Jay is also certified in “Radon Gas” measurement for homes and can provide mitigation methods. Our group has years of experience in all types of home improvements including interior and exterior of the houses. 

For any inquiry please call + 416 464 7920 or send and email to
inspectjj@gmail.com

Certificates: 

Civil Engineering Technology
Seneca College Home Inspection Certificate
National Exam Home Inspection Certificate by Canadian Home & Property Inspection association 
Radon Course 
Construction Safety
Hazardous Materials
